thread.title: BRIEF-China Zhengtong Auto Services Enters Term Loan Facility For Initial Total Amount US$380 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Zhengtong Auto Services Enters Term Loan Facility For Initial Total Amount US$380 Mln

organizations.name: china zhengtong auto services holdings ltd
brief-china zhengtong auto services enters term loan facility for initial total amount

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - China Zhengtong Auto Services Holdings Ltd:
* CO & 2 UNITS ENTER DEAL FOR CO TO ENTER SYNDICATED TERM LOAN FACILITY FOR INITIAL TOTAL AMOUNT US$380 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
